title: Install the tools required by Zephyr
description: Installing Zephyr Requirements and Dependencies on Linux.

[Zephyr Getting Started for Linux](https://docs.zephyrproject.org/latest/getting_started/installation_linux.html#installing-requirements-and-dependencies) have more descriptions for how to get all the needed tools.

dpkg -s git cmake ninja-build gperf ccache doxygen dfu-util device-tree-compiler python3-ply python3-pip python3-setuptools python3-wheel xz-utils file make gcc-multilib autoconf automake libtool librsvg2-bin texlive-latex-base texlive-latex-extra latexmk texlive-fonts-recommended

steps.title: Install dependencies (apt)
description: Use ``apt-get`` to install the required packages by entering the following command:

sudo apt-get install --no-install-recommends git cmake ninja-build gperf \
 ccache doxygen dfu-util device-tree-compiler \
 python3-ply python3-pip python3-setuptools python3-wheel xz-utils file \
 make gcc-multilib autoconf automake libtool librsvg2-bin \
 texlive-latex-base texlive-latex-extra latexmk texlive-fonts-recommended

steps.title: Install dependencies (rpm)
description: Use ``dnf`` to install the required packages by entering the following command:
sudo dnf group install "Development Tools" "C Development Tools and Libraries"

sudo dnf install git cmake ninja-build gperf ccache\
 doxygen dfu-util dtc python3-pip \
 python3-ply python3-yaml dfu-util dtc python3-pykwalify \
 glibc-devel.i686 libstdc++-devel.i686 autoconf automake libtool\
 texlive-latex latexmk texlive-collection-fontsrecommended librsvg2-tools

steps.title: Install dependencies (swupd)
description: Use ``swupd`` to install the required packages by entering the following command:

sudo swupd bundle-add c-basic dev-utils dfu-util dtc \
 os-core-dev python-basic python3-basic texlive

steps.title: Check CMake version
steps.description: Enter `cmake --version` to check which version of CMake you have installed. The nRF Connect SDK requires CMake version 3.8.2 or later.
